messages.title: DEMAND ACTION
messages.content: Stuart stands for everything you believe in: Public NHS, Free Movement, Climate Action, Free Education. Vote for it on 8th June.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: The NHS won’t survive unless we reverse the self-defeating Tory cuts and hands our health and care.
Freedom to travel, work and study in the EU. 2nd Referendum on our final deal with option to Remain.
We have 5 years left to prevent dangerous global warming. We must act seriously now.
Scrap tuition fees and bring back maintenance grants. Get young people out of debt.

mentions.candidate: STUART stands for everything you believe in
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Lib Dems: Austerity cuts and tuition fees; Labour Party: Brexit and no free movement

issues.brexitEurope: Freedom to travel, work and study in the EU. 2nd Referendum on our final deal with option to Remain.
issues.education: Scrap tuition fees and bring back maintenance grants. Get young people out of debt.
issues.environment: We have 5 years left to prevent dangerous global warming. We must act seriously now.
issues.health: The NHS won’t survive unless we reverse the self-defeating Tory cuts and hands our health and care.

leaflet.personalStatement: I'm a nurse working on the NHS front line. I can see that the NHS simply won’t exist as you know it in 5 more years — unless it’s fully funded. I’d make the NHS public again, fight for proper staff pay and training, and ensure you get the dignified treatment you deserve.

examples: I’ll crack down on the £35,000,000,000 per year of tax avoidance.
The NHS won’t survive unless we reverse the self-defeating Tory cuts and hands our health and care.
Freedom to travel, work and study in the EU. 2nd Referendum on our final deal with option to Remain.
We have 5 years left to prevent dangerous global warming. We must act seriously now.
Scrap tuition fees and bring back maintenance grants. Get young people out of debt.
If you were ever going to vote Green, you have to do it this time.
Send your strongest demand for action – Vote Green

personalStories.story: I'm a nurse working on the NHS front line. I can see that the NHS simply won’t exist as you know it in 5 more years — unless it’s fully funded.

examples: Lib Dems: Austerity cuts and tuition fees
Labour Party: Brexit and no free movement

nonPolicyAttributes.localness: Local Campaigner, NHS Charge Nurse and MP Candidate
